sentences.en: The nightlife is great with bars and clubs right on the doorstep.
sentences.cn: 有这些酒吧和夜总会位于家门口，夜生活真是棒极了。

sentences.en: It is easy to lose sight of what is happening on our own doorstep.
sentences.cn: 家门口发生的事反而容易被我们忽视。

sentences.en: She just turned up unannounced on my doorstep.
sentences.cn: 她未打招呼就来到我家门口了。
